summary: Winona, a successful artist looking to get away from her stressful life. Her manager rents her a house in her home town where she runs in to an old boyfriend. They go back to the house, only to find out it is not as empty as they assumed.
cast: Hanna Oldenburg|Ralf Beck|Andreas Rylander|Elin Hugoson|Patrick Saxe|David Liljeblad
keywords: female nudity|bare breasts|psychotronic film|slasher|three word title
title: Blood Runs Cold
